casebody.data:
STATE
v.
BUTTERY 2018-0183 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 9, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW Cause accepted on proposition of law No. I. Sua sponte, cause held for the decision in 2017-0087, State v. Carries, and briefing schedule stayed. O'Connor, C.J., and DeGenaro, J., would also accept the cause on proposition of law No. Ill and hold the cause for the decision in 2017-1778, State v. Amos. DeWine, J., dissents.

Fischer, J., not participating.
